task.title: Installing the JDK Software
task.shortdesc: Open Search Server (OSS) requires a Java™ runtime environment (JRE) version 5 or newer.

step.cmd: Download the JDK software from Sun Microsystems or IBM.

choices.choice: Sun Microsystems provides its JRE (or JDK) for the Windows™ ,Linux and Solaris™ operating systems: Sun download page .
IBM® provides its JRE for the AIX™ and Linux operating systems: IBM developer kit

step.cmd: Select appropriate JRE/JDK version and download.
Install the JRE/JDK using the installation instructions.
